page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: ON JULY 1ST FOUR BOYS WENT TO INTERVEIW MRS.TOWNSEND A LOCAL WRITER WE ASKED HER WHAT KIND OF BOOKS SHE WRITES. SHE SAID THAT SHE HAS ONLY WRITTEN ONE NOVEL BUT SHE HAS WRITTEN SEVERAL BOOKS ABOUT THE LOCALITY OF GREAT HARWOOD. SHE HAS BEEN WRITING 17YRS AND SHE WRITES UNDER THE NAME OF JOAN POMFRET IT USUALLY TAKES HER 6 MONTHS TO WRITE A BOOK SHE HAS WRITTEN 5 BOOKS OF POEMS IN LOCAL DIALECT.SHE PREFERS TO READ HISTORICAL BOOKS. MRS.TOWNSEND LIVES IN A VERY INTERESTING OLD HOUSE CALLED STOOPS FARM WHICH IS OVER 300YRS.OLD. IT IS STONE BUILT WITH EXPOSED BEAMS AND VERY INTERESTING.THE LIVING ROOM USED TO BE A BARN AND THE BEDROOM USED TO BE A HAY LOFT.
